thing-type.label: GPIO Digital Input Thing
thing-type.description: Get digital state of a GPIO Pin

parameter-group.name: pullup-settings
parameter-group.description: When the value of a GPIO ping has changed it can be double checked after a given amount of time to prevent wrong change events
parameter-group.label: Pullup Settings

parameter.name: gpioId
parameter.label: GPIO Pin
parameter.description: GPIO pin to use as input

parameter.name: pullup_time
parameter.label: Delay time
parameter.description: Time in ms to double check if value hasn't changed

parameter.name: pullup_strict
parameter.label: Strict mode
parameter.description: If strict mode enabled, event wouldn't be fired when the value changed in the pullup time period. If not the event would only not be fired when the Value at the end of the time hasn't changed even if it changed in the time between
